resources.string: The maximum number of feedback queries you are will to give per day:
Remember that the accurcy will be better when more feedback is given
Did you feel that the prediction accuracy increased after using the app for a couple of days?
Did you find the query requests disturbing?

Would you be more willing to answer more request in the following scenario: Queries can only be asked in a fixed training phase of e.g. two days when starting to use the app, after that the user wonâ€™t be queried anymore at all.
How useful did you find the visualization of your daily activities?
Did you find the visualization of your daily activities accurate?
Could you think of other applications that would be possible with / would benefit from this kind of context prediction?
Do you feel comfortable with audio data used for recognition?
What are your concern regarding audio data used for recognition?
Could you think of ways to protect privacy of users better?
Please feel free to give any other feedback
Thanks you for your feedback! Would you like to help our project even further and fill out our evaluation for in less the 5 minutes?

This app will recognize daily activities like taking the train, eating at a restaurant etc. based on ambient sound recorded by your phone.



You can select the activities you would like to be recognized later, but keep in mind, that they have to be discriminable by their sound.
Additionally you can always provide this feedback voluntarily by clicking on the pencil and the tick mark icon on the main screen.
Please select the activities here that you would like to be recognized:
If the automatic upload of your audio data failed, please start it again by pressing the button:
Add new classes and remove by unselecting exsisting classes by unselecting:
